Text: anyone knows how i can open it? notepad wont work, all i see is scribbles.
Its an epub, its supposed to work with Itunes, but it doesnt open when executed. I suggest DLing a free Epub reader program like Calibre or something, checking the viability of it now.
A free program called "AZARDI" opens ePub files and this eBook also without any problem.
You could also try downloading calibre, its an ebook manager which allows you to convert it from epub to pdf or txt
